alert.note: Alert for Palo Duro Canyon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 24 at 11:45AM CDT until June 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperature of 107 is expected today. * WHERE...Palo Duro Canyon County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heat index is currently in play as dewpoints are in the mid 60s. This is expected to drop off later this afternoon, and the dewpoint should drop into the 40s. Still, the afternoon high temperature looks to top out around 108 today.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
